channel.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
channel.description:
Ok this should not be hard for those with good coding experience however its hard for me with some coding experience.
I want to make an ::unstuck CHARNAME command that will edit the coords in the char folder to: [code] character-posx = 2605 character-posy = 3092 [/code]
For example somebody's coords are atm: [code][CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 2899 character-posy = 3557[/code]
and when I use the ::unstuck CHARNAME it will edit the char file and put the coords to
[code] character-posx = 2605 character-posy = 3092 [/code]
Thank you in advance!!!!

why dont u make Command ::home…

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

now when you get stuck, which will happen, just make sure they are using a client that lets them have access to that area. i played a server and got stuck in jad, and then i got introduced to silab ect. i could play then. try something like that

Read full topic

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Gh0stb4rr4g3, post:16, topic:170729”]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“unstuck”))
{
teleportToX = 2605;
teleportToY = 3092;
sendMessage(“You got succefully unstucked.”);[/quote]
This command will fail becuase people will use it in wildy.

A command that would work for someone offline would need to be a remake of
“public boolean savechar() {” but saves the Coords as a set value

Read full topic

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Try this …

It’s a simple command but should work , if you want it to make something like: ::unstuck player

You just have to add the file + , +playername etc.

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("unstuck")) { teleportToX = 2605; teleportToY = 3092; sendMessage("You got succefully unstucked."); [br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 28, 2009, 11:03:15 am[/size][hr]Ah and if you want ::unstuck other

You can’t because the player must be online.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @adamhelloman8 adamhelloman8
item.description:
@adamhelloman8 wrote:

loggedout:

does ur server need a client? if it does thats the reason there going to an area which is not supported by the 317 cache if this is a 503/508/474 and they go to some where say pest control there acc will freeze and when they log they will see black screen.

Your probably right. They’re probably stuck because your using a 317 source (bet your using a delta base) and they’re just on like a silabs client, going to places which you need a client for.

Read full topic

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

[quote=“elitescouter, post:11, topic:170729”][quote author=delta link=topic=230702.msg1977073#msg1977073 date=1199509928]
Don’t be lazy go in there character files and change it
[/quote]
You know how hard it is to change like 10% of people out of 3,000+ files?[/quote]

You go in there, type in their char name, find it, edit it, done.

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

You guys, I need to teleport an “OFFLINE” player to a certain coords. Xteletome does not work on offline people. People who are stuck can’t log in their chars untill I edit the X, Y coords to certain place.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @huggies huggies
item.description:
@huggies wrote:

[quote=“ChemicalReaction™, post:5, topic:170729”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("unstuck") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to save); } }

pretty much xteletome command ^^ .[/quote]

Might want to add an last " in sendMessage.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!

[quote=“ChemicalReaction, post:5, topic:170729”]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("unstuck") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to save); } }

pretty much xteletome command ^^ .[/quote]

But would that work if the player is offline?

item.title: Ok! This shouldnt be hard for you coders to help me with!
item.dc:creator: @elitescouter elitescouter
item.description:
@elitescouter wrote:

[quote=“bradster, post:3, topic:170729”]"and when I use the ::unstuck CHARNAME it will edit the char file and put the coords to "

Well , first off all , the player should log out BEFORE you use the code , because else , it won’t work, wich makes i worthless.

You can better add a ::xteletome [Username][/quote]

For some reason people who are stuck can’t log in to their char its like a bugg at a certain place. When they log in it just kicks them off and won’t let them get on.

I need one to edit their X, Y while they are offline.

Thanks

Read full topic
